document.full_text: german health officials said on wednesday there had been a dramatic increase in the number of people infected in an e.coli outbreak which has so far killed 16 and whose source is still unknown.
document.title: germany: sharp rise in e.coli cases, source unknown
lines_and_colors: german health officials said on wednesday there had been a dramatic increase in the number of people infected in an e.coli outbreak which has so far killed 16 and whose source is still unknown.
